item.title: patchelf更改libc脚本
item.description: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably. — William C. Menninger 使用方法 changelibc 程序文件名 ld名字 libc路径 ld名字和libc路径如果不想改变可以用0、$、?、:四个分隔
